public static interface LibraryContract.Presenter
Library Presenter
For handling UI logic.

  • Method Details

    • beforeViewCreated

      void beforeViewCreated(User user)
      Handles initialization logic before the library fragment is displayed.
      Parameters:
      user - Representation of user to obtain library information from.

    • onViewCreated

      void onViewCreated(User user, android.content.Context context)
      Handles initialization logic when the library fragment is displayed.
      Parameters:
      user - Representation of user to obtain library information from.
      context - Context of the library screen.

    • onBookTapped

      void onBookTapped(Book book)
      Handles logic when a book is tapped
      Parameters:
      book - Representation of book that was clicked.

    • createBookMenu

      void createBookMenu(android.view.ContextMenu menu, android.view.View v, android.view.ContextMenu.ContextMenuInfo menuInfo)
      Creates pop-menu to display options of different actions for the book.
      Parameters:
      menu - The current menu.
      v - The view context.
      menuInfo - Information of the menu.

    • onBookMenuItemSelected

      void onBookMenuItemSelected(User user, android.view.MenuItem item)
      Handles logic for book menu item selection
      Parameters:
      user - Representation of user that holds the current library.
      item - The menu item that was clicked.
